templates.body:
UPDATE public."active_app_report" SET
    "active_app" = ''
    "num_api_calls" = 1
    "date" = ''
    "report_type" = ''
    "app_id" = ''

actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO public.template_table (
	col1,
	col2, 
	col3,
	col4, 
	col5
)
VALUES (
				{{insert_col_input1.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input2.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input3.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input4.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input5.text}}
);

INSERT INTO public.template_table (
	col1,
	col2, 
	col3,
	col4, 
	col5
)
VALUES (
				{{insert_col_input1.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input2.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input3.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input4.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input5.text}}
);

UPDATE public.template_table SET
		col2 = '{{update_col_2.text}}',
    col3 = '{{update_col_3.text}}',
    col4 = '{{update_col_4.text}}',
    col5 = '{{update_col_5.text}}'
  WHERE col1 = {{Table1.selectedRow.col1}};

UPDATE public.template_table SET
		col2 = '{{update_col_2.text}}',
    col3 = '{{update_col_3.text}}',
    col4 = '{{update_col_4.text}}',
    col5 = '{{update_col_5.text}}'
  WHERE col1 = {{Table1.selectedRow.col1}};
